products.name: White Folded Flatbreads
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Flatbreads, White breads, Wheat breads, Wheat flatbreads
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality wheat flour for a soft texture.","Produced using eco-friendly practices to minimize environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives.","Packaged in recyclable materials to promote sustainability."]

products.name: Simply salt rice crackers
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Sweet snacks, Appetizers, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Crackers
products.labels: No gluten, No artificial flavors, No GMOs, Certified gluten-free, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Simply salt rice crackers are made from high-quality rice flour and salt, ensuring a simple and wholesome ingredient list.","The crackers are typically gluten-free, making them a suitable snack for those with gluten sensitivities.","The production process prioritizes eco-friendly practices, often utilizing sustainable sourcing for ingredients.","Simply salt rice crackers are low in calories and contain no artificial preservatives, promoting a healthier snacking option."]

products.name: Old Country Style Muesli
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, en:mueslis
products.facts: ["Made with whole grains, nuts, and dried fruits for a nutritious breakfast option.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring a natural product.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Sourced from sustainable farms to support ecological practices in agriculture."]

products.name: Kellogs froot loops box
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Extruded cereals
products.facts: ["The Froot Loops box is made from 100% recycled paperboard.","Kellogg's aims to use sustainable sourcing for its packaging materials by 2025.","The box is designed to be easily recyclable in most local recycling programs.","Kellogg's has committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions in its packaging supply chain."]

products.name: Tomato ketchup
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Tomato Ketchup, Groceries
products.facts: ["Tomato ketchup is primarily made from tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and various spices.","Tomatoes used in ketchup are often grown in monoculture systems, which can impact biodiversity.","Many ketchup brands are now using organic tomatoes to improve ecological sustainability.","Quality ketchup typically contains a higher percentage of tomato solids, which contributes to its flavor and thickness."]

products.name: Scrocchi with sesame and poppy seeds
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Sweet snacks, Appetizers, Biscuits and cakes, Crackers
products.facts: ["Scrocchi are typically made from simple ingredients like flour, water, sesame seeds, and poppy seeds.","They are often baked, making them a low-fat snack option compared to fried alternatives.","Sesame and poppy seeds are rich in essential nutrients, contributing to a healthier diet.","Scrocchi are often packaged in eco-friendly materials to minimize environmental impact."]

products.name: Reese's Nutrageouss
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Nuts and their products, Bars, Chocolate candies, Bars covered with chocolate, Nut bars, Peanut bars
products.facts: ["Reese's Nutrageouss contains a mix of peanut butter, chocolate, and crunchy peanuts.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness.","The product is certified gluten-free, ensuring quality for those with dietary restrictions.","Reese's Nutrageouss is made with real ingredients, including milk chocolate and roasted peanuts."]

products.name: Grape-Nuts
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals
products.facts: ["Grape-Nuts are made primarily from whole grain wheat flour and barley flour.","The packaging for Grape-Nuts is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal.","Grape-Nuts contain no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring a natural product.","The cereal is high in fiber, contributing to a balanced diet and overall health."]

products.name: Nachos cheese
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Chips and fries, Crisps, Corn chips
products.facts: ["Nacho cheese is typically made from a combination of processed cheese, milk, and spices.","It can be served warm or cold, often melted over tortilla chips.","Nacho cheese sauce can be found in both canned and jarred varieties for convenience.","The flavor of nacho cheese can vary widely depending on the type of cheese and seasonings used."]

products.name: Multi grain cheerios
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Lightly sweetened cereal
products.facts: ["Multi Grain Cheerios are made from a blend of whole grain oats, corn, and rice.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting better waste management and sustainability.","Multi Grain Cheerios contain no artificial flavors or colors, ensuring a quality product.","The product is low in saturated fat and cholesterol-free, contributing to a healthier diet."]

products.name: Risotto  safran
products.facts: ["Risotto saffron is made with Arborio rice, known for its high starch content, which creates a creamy texture when cooked.","Saffron is derived from the flower of Crocus sativus, requiring careful hand-harvesting, making it one of the most labor-intensive spices.","The cultivation of saffron can promote biodiversity in agricultural systems, as it is often grown in rotation with other crops.","Quality saffron is characterized by its deep red color and strong aroma, with authentic saffron having a distinct, slightly bitter flavor."]
